Type-hint for Express types

Dinoloop is an Expressjs library and its philosophy is not to tie user to specific Expressjs version. With such philosophy there comes some caveats. The Request, Response, NextFunction properties of ApiController are Expressjs types, and to have a type-hint on Express objects in development it is required to override node_modules/dinoloop/modules/types/express.d.ts contents. This can only be done after you install @types/express.

First install Expressjs types (version of your choice)


    

    
Now paste the following content inside
        node_modules/dinoloop/modules/types/express.d.ts
    

    

        

    

    
You will now have type-hints on Expressjs objects in development.





    

        
        Remember
    

    
    
        
  • 
            You will have to provide the installed path of Expressjs types.
        
    • 
        
  • 
            You dont need to map the Expressjs types in production environment. This is required only in development.
